prompt:
Nurse: That's good to hear, Ms. Warrell. Lastly, have you been using more pillows at night to sleep?

Patient: No, ma'am.

Nurse: That's good to hear, Ms. Warrell. We just performed a simple CHF assessment. It's a good idea to keep an eye on these symptoms at home every day. I understand that keeping track of symptoms can be complicated. Do you have any questions about how to do so?

Patient: No.

Nurse: I apologize for the confusion earlier, Ms. Warrell. Could you please confirm whether you've been using more pillows at night to sleep?

Patient: Of course.

Nurse: Give me a moment while I figure out how I can best help you. Give me a moment to check how I can best support you.

Patient: No. I don't need extra kilos at night.

responses.gpt4: Apologies for any confusion, Ms. Warrell. To clarify, are you saying you're not using more pillows to sleep at night?
responses.our_model: That's good to hear, Ms. Warrell. Now, let's talk about your diet. Could you tell me about some of the meals you've had recently?
